N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 41.1 - Service brake standard

State Regulations

The service brakes on every motor vehicle and every
combination of motor vehicle and trailer, operated on a public highway under
any condition of loading, shall be capable of stopping the vehicle or
combination by reducing its speed at a rate sufficient to bring it to a stop
from the speed of 20 miles per hour on a hard, dry, approximately level
pavement, substantially free from loose material within the distances specified
below: (a) Brakes which can be applied
to every wheel, 30 feet. (b) Brakes
which cannot be applied to every wheel, 45 feet. Notes
